{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Graphics Designer",
  "description": "Enviable Group is a dynamic and fast-growing conglomerate with business interests spanning transportation, logistics, investment, oil &amp; gas. We are driven by innovation, excellence, and creativity in delivering value to our customers.
We are seeking a highly creative, detail-oriented and versatile Graphic Designer to join our communications and branding team. The ideal candidate is a visual storyteller with a strong design sense, a deep understanding of brand strategy and the ability to translate ideas into compelling visuals across digital and print media.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Conceptualize, design and produce high-quality creative materials for branding, marketing campaigns, social media, digital ads, websites, brochures, billboards, and corporate documents.
	Maintain brand consistency across all creative deliverables.
	Collaborate with the marketing and communications teams to develop visual concepts that align with the company&rsquo;s strategic goals.
	Create engaging designs for product packaging, vehicle branding, and promotional events.
	Develop content layouts for newsletters, presentations, reports, and internal communications.
	Manage multiple design projects simultaneously while meeting tight deadlines.
	Stay up to date with current design trends, tools and best practices.
	Ensure that all graphics are optimized for various platforms (web, mobile, print).
	Prepare final design files for production or publication (both print and digital).
	Contribute innovative ideas to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement.


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree or HND in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, Visual Communication, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of professional design experience in a corporate or creative agency environment.
	Expert proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, After Effects, Premiere Pro) or equivalent design tools.
	Strong portfolio demonstrating exceptional creative and technical design skills.
	Experience in branding, social media content design, motion graphics, and video editing is an advantage.
	Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize effectively under pressure.
	Excellent communication, teamwork, and presentation skills.
	Keen eye for detail, color, typography and layout balance.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio link (or sample works), and cover letter &nbsp;to:&nbsp;careers@enviable.group&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Application for Graphic Designer Position&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-24",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-28",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Enviable Group"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "189338"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Graphics Designer Job at Enviable Group




        
    

        
        Enviable Group is a dynamic and fast-growing conglomerate with business interests spanning transportation, logistics, investment, oil & gas. We are driven by innovation, excellence, and creativity in delivering value to our customers.
We are seeking a highly creative, detail-oriented and versatile Graphic Designer to join our communications and branding team. The ideal candidate is a visual storyteller with a strong design sense, a deep understanding of brand strategy and the ability to translate ideas into compelling visuals across digital and print media.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Conceptualize, design and produce high-quality creative materials for branding, marketing campaigns, social media, digital ads, websites, brochures, billboards, and corporate documents.
	Maintain brand consistency across all creative deliverables.
	Collaborate with the marketing and communications teams to develop visual concepts that align with the company’s strategic goals.
	Create engaging designs for product packaging, vehicle branding, and promotional events.
	Develop content layouts for newsletters, presentations, reports, and internal communications.
	Manage multiple design projects simultaneously while meeting tight deadlines.
	Stay up to date with current design trends, tools and best practices.
	Ensure that all graphics are optimized for various platforms (web, mobile, print).
	Prepare final design files for production or publication (both print and digital).
	Contribute innovative ideas to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement.


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree or HND in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, Visual Communication, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of professional design experience in a corporate or creative agency environment.
	Expert proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, After Effects, Premiere Pro) or equivalent design tools.
	Strong portfolio demonstrating exceptional creative and technical design skills.
	Experience in branding, social media content design, motion graphics, and video editing is an advantage.
	Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize effectively under pressure.
	Excellent communication, teamwork, and presentation skills.
	Keen eye for detail, color, typography and layout balance.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio link (or sample works), and cover letter  to: careers@enviable.group using “Application for Graphic Designer Position” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketing Specialist",
  "description": "EPT handles complete projects, from the design and construction of industrial plants to commissioning, operation, and maintenance. With our technology and management capacities, we deliver with strong Project and Customer satisfaction through our work culture committed to international Quality, Safety, Health, and Environment standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Digital Strategy &amp; Campaign Management:


	Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies that align with business and&nbsp;client objectives.
	Plan and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns across social media, email, search engines,&nbsp;and digital advertising.
	Establish KPIs and use analytics to measure and optimize campaign performance.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (design, development, and sales) to ensure consistency in&nbsp;messaging and brand identity.
	Manage and allocate digital marketing budgets efficiently to maximize ROI.


Social Media &amp; Content Creation:


	Oversee and grow social media presence across major platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, TikTok, YouTube).
	Develop engaging content&mdash;including graphics, videos, blogs, and interactive posts&mdash;aligned with brand voice and campaign goals.
	Use scheduling and analytics tools to track performance and audience engagement.
	Coordinate community management and audience interaction to build brand loyalty and visibility.


Email Marketing &amp; Automation:


	Create and manage email marketing campaigns that drive engagement, retention, and conversion.
	Implement segmentation, personalization, and automation workflows (welcome sequences, nurture flows, drip campaigns).
	Conduct A/B testing for subject lines, design, and calls-to-action to improve key metrics (open rate, CTR, conversion).
	Ensure compliance with GDPR, CAN-SPAM, and other email marketing regulations.


Search Engine Optimization (SEO):


	Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and SEO audits to improve organic search visibility.
	Optimize on-page content, metadata, and site architecture for search engine performance.
	Collaborate with content creators and web developers to implement SEO best practices.
	Track and report on keyword rankings, backlinks, and traffic growth using tools such as Google
	Analytics, SEMrush, and Ahrefs.


Digital Media Design &amp; Branding:


	Design visually compelling digital assets including social media graphics, email templates, banners, and web visuals.
	Create motion graphics and multimedia content for promotional campaigns and ads.
	Maintain brand consistency across all channels, ensuring alignment with organizational standards and client guidelines.
	Collaborate with developers and UX/UI designers to optimize digital interfaces and user experiences.


Analytics &amp; Reporting:


	Monitor and analyze marketing data to evaluate performance and identify areas for improvement.
	Present regular reports on key metrics, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders.
	Use AI-driven and automation tools to enhance targeting, personalization, and conversion&nbsp;optimization.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree with 3 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N400,000 - N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to&nbsp;chidera.onwurah@ept.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Digital Marketing Specialist Job at Energy and Plant Technology




        
    

        
        EPT handles complete projects, from the design and construction of industrial plants to commissioning, operation, and maintenance. With our technology and management capacities, we deliver with strong Project and Customer satisfaction through our work culture committed to international Quality, Safety, Health, and Environment standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Digital Strategy & Campaign Management:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies that align with business and client objectives.
	Plan and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns across social media, email, search engines, and digital advertising.
	Establish KPIs and use analytics to measure and optimize campaign performance.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (design, development, and sales) to ensure consistency in messaging and brand identity.
	Manage and allocate digital marketing budgets efficiently to maximize ROI.


Social Media & Content Creation:


	Oversee and grow social media presence across major platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, TikTok, YouTube).
	Develop engaging content—including graphics, videos, blogs, and interactive posts—aligned with brand voice and campaign goals.
	Use scheduling and analytics tools to track performance and audience engagement.
	Coordinate community management and audience interaction to build brand loyalty and visibility.


Email Marketing & Automation:


	Create and manage email marketing campaigns that drive engagement, retention, and conversion.
	Implement segmentation, personalization, and automation workflows (welcome sequences, nurture flows, drip campaigns).
	Conduct A/B testing for subject lines, design, and calls-to-action to improve key metrics (open rate, CTR, conversion).
	Ensure compliance with GDPR, CAN-SPAM, and other email marketing regulations.


Search Engine Optimization (SEO):


	Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and SEO audits to improve organic search visibility.
	Optimize on-page content, metadata, and site architecture for search engine performance.
	Collaborate with content creators and web developers to implement SEO best practices.
	Track and report on keyword rankings, backlinks, and traffic growth using tools such as Google
	Analytics, SEMrush, and Ahrefs.


Digital Media Design & Branding:


	Design visually compelling digital assets including social media graphics, email templates, banners, and web visuals.
	Create motion graphics and multimedia content for promotional campaigns and ads.
	Maintain brand consistency across all channels, ensuring alignment with organizational standards and client guidelines.
	Collaborate with developers and UX/UI designers to optimize digital interfaces and user experiences.


Analytics & Reporting:


	Monitor and analyze marketing data to evaluate performance and identify areas for improvement.
	Present regular reports on key metrics, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders.
	Use AI-driven and automation tools to enhance targeting, personalization, and conversion optimization.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree with 3 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N400,000 - N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to chidera.onwurah@ept.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Kartel
content:
Kartel is a brand of Skyville Company Limited, a leading manufacturer of Solar systems including Inverters, Solar Panels, Solar Charge Controllers, Solar batteries, etc. Kärtel products are recognized worldwide for their resilient quality and reliability for various domestic and commercial applications. One of the best solar solutions in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Executive

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Conduct market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs.
	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking and social media.
	Set up meetings with potential clients and listen to their wishes and concerns.
	Prepare and deliver appropriate presentations on products and services.
	Create frequent reviews and reports with sales and financial data.
	Ensure the availability of stock for sales and demonstrations.
	Participate on behalf of the company in exhibitions or conferences.
	Negotiate/close deals and handle complaints or objections.
	Collaborate with team members to achieve better results.
	Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share with internal teams.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: tope@skyvillelimited.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Solar PCB Technician

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT), Kaduna and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Assemble, inspect, and test printed circuit boards (PCBs) used in solar power systems.
	Diagnose and repair faulty PCBs, components, and electrical connections.
	Perform soldering, wiring, and circuit testing to ensure product reliability and compliance.
	Read and interpret circuit diagrams, schematics, and technical manuals.
	Conduct quality control checks on electronic components and finished products.
	Maintain accurate repair and testing records for documentation and reporting.
	Ensure adherence to safety and industry standards during all repair and assembly processes.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree or HND qualification with 1 - 3 years of work experience.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: tope@skyvillelimited.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 


3.) Sales Executive

Job Location: Kaduna 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Conduct market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs
	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking and social media
	Set up meetings with potential clients and listen to their wishes and concerns
	Prepare and deliver appropriate presentations on products and services
	Create frequent reviews and reports with sales and financial data
	Ensure the availability of stock for sales and demonstrations
	Participate on behalf of the company in exhibitions or conferences
	Negotiate/close deals and handle complaints or objections
	Collaborate with team members to achieve better results
	Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share with internal teams.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 1 - 3 years of work experience.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: tope@skyvillelimited.com using the Job Position the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Full-Stack Web Developer & Digital Systems Specialist",
  "description": "Energy and Plant Technology handles complete projects, from the design and construction of industrial plants to commissioning, operation, and maintenance. With our technology and management capacities, we deliver with strong Project and Customer satisfaction through our work culture committed to international Quality, Safety, Health, and Environment standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-Stack Web Developer &amp; Digital Systems Specialist
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Web Application Development:


	Design, build, and deploy responsive, full-stack web applications with intuitive user interfaces and secure, high-performing back-end systems.
	Develop key features such as QR-based lead capture, subscription systems, data dashboards, and API integrations (payment gateways, communication tools, CRM, etc.).
	Architect scalable systems using JavaScript, TypeScript, React/Next.js, Node.js/Express, and PostgreSQL/MongoDB/MySQL.
	Implement cloud-based deployment pipelines (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) and ensure CI/CD reliability.
	Build and maintain RESTful APIs and integrate third-party APIs for data and marketing automation.
	Ensure compliance with GDPR/CCPA and other privacy and security standards.


E-Commerce, SEO, and Performance Optimization:


	Develop and optimize e-commerce components (checkout, inventory, payment processing).
	Implement SEO best practices for metadata, indexing, and site speed optimization.
	Use analytics tools (Google Analytics, Tag Manager, SEMrush, or Ahrefs) to monitor performance and user behavior.
	Conduct A/B testing and develop content strategies to increase conversion and user engagement.
	Maintenance, Monitoring &amp; Continuous Improvement
	Conduct ongoing website performance audits and implement improvements in speed, accessibility, and scalability.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree with 3 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N400,000 - N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to&nbsp;chidera.onwurah@ept.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Full-Stack Web Developer & Digital Systems Specialist Job at Energy and Plant Technology




        
    

        
        Energy and Plant Technology handles complete projects, from the design and construction of industrial plants to commissioning, operation, and maintenance. With our technology and management capacities, we deliver with strong Project and Customer satisfaction through our work culture committed to international Quality, Safety, Health, and Environment standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-Stack Web Developer & Digital Systems Specialist
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Web Application Development:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design, build, and deploy responsive, full-stack web applications with intuitive user interfaces and secure, high-performing back-end systems.
	Develop key features such as QR-based lead capture, subscription systems, data dashboards, and API integrations (payment gateways, communication tools, CRM, etc.).
	Architect scalable systems using JavaScript, TypeScript, React/Next.js, Node.js/Express, and PostgreSQL/MongoDB/MySQL.
	Implement cloud-based deployment pipelines (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) and ensure CI/CD reliability.
	Build and maintain RESTful APIs and integrate third-party APIs for data and marketing automation.
	Ensure compliance with GDPR/CCPA and other privacy and security standards.


E-Commerce, SEO, and Performance Optimization:


	Develop and optimize e-commerce components (checkout, inventory, payment processing).
	Implement SEO best practices for metadata, indexing, and site speed optimization.
	Use analytics tools (Google Analytics, Tag Manager, SEMrush, or Ahrefs) to monitor performance and user behavior.
	Conduct A/B testing and develop content strategies to increase conversion and user engagement.
	Maintenance, Monitoring & Continuous Improvement
	Conduct ongoing website performance audits and implement improvements in speed, accessibility, and scalability.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree with 3 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N400,000 - N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to chidera.onwurah@ept.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
